xyz.theprogramsrc.supercoreapi.global.files

Class FlatFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.theprogramsrc.supercoreapi.global.files.FlatFile

  • public class FlatFile
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents a flat file without a specific format This is usually used for debug/log purposes

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FlatFile(java.io.File file)
      Constructor of the FlatFile, If the file doesnt exists it will be created
      FlatFile(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructor of the FlatFile, If the file doesnt exists it will be created

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(java.lang.Exception ex)
      Same as the add line but in this case you can add an exception (By default it's dated See add(Exception, boolean))
      void add(java.lang.Exception exception, boolean dated)
      Same as the add line but in this case you can add an exception If dated is true the current time will be added at the start of the content otherwise it wont have the date
      void add(java.lang.String line)
      Insert a line at the end of the file (By default it's dated See add(String, boolean))
      void add(java.lang.String line, boolean dated)
      Insert a line at the end of the file If dated is true the current time will be added at the start of the content otherwise it wont have the date
      java.io.File getFile()
      Gets the file where is stored all the data
      java.lang.String getLastLine()
      Gets the last line from the file
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getLines()
      Gets all the lines inside the file
      void remove(int index)
      Removes a line from the file at the specified index

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • FlatFile

        public FlatFile(java.io.File folder,
                java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructor of the FlatFile, If the file doesnt exists it will be created
        Parameters:
        folder - Folder where will be located the file
        fileName - Name of the file to store all the data

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String line)
        Insert a line at the end of the file (By default it's dated See add(String, boolean))
        Parameters:
        line - Content of the line to add

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String line,
                boolean dated)
        Insert a line at the end of the file If dated is true the current time will be added at the start of the content otherwise it wont have the date
        Parameters:
        line - Content of the line to add
        dated - Whether the content of the line will be with the current time or not

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Exception ex)
        Same as the add line but in this case you can add an exception (By default it's dated See add(Exception, boolean))
        Parameters:
        ex - Exception to add

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Exception exception,
                boolean dated)
        Same as the add line but in this case you can add an exception If dated is true the current time will be added at the start of the content otherwise it wont have the date
        Parameters:
        exception - Exception to add
        dated - Whether the content of the line will be with the current time or not

      • remove

        public void remove(int index)
        Removes a line from the file at the specified index
        Parameters:
        index - Index to remove from the file

      • getLastLine

        public java.lang.String getLastLine()
        Gets the last line from the file
        Returns:
        The last stored line in the file

        Gets the file where is stored all the data
